title: looking for 4 people to play consistently for hours on end with me
body: I am sick of people telling me to come play then leaving after one or two games, i have no life come play with me :P

replies.body: I'd play, but as you are level 29 and I am only level 15 and currently am not that good because I am still learning, I will spare you that lolz
No one is good at the game from day one~ just relax and have fun

Support main, casual adc player
at ur service free of charge!! 
Keeping u alive with the best of my abilities~~
but if u die... Well u die...

Operating from 7pm till 12am!
Please call 1300 SORAKA for more detail!
Or simply add me ingame ;D
